description: This file is a configuration script for Vite, a build tool for frontend projects. It defines the Vite configuration, including plugin setup, server settings, environment variable loading, and proxy rules.

methods.name: defineConfig
methods.description: Defines the Vite configuration object, accepting a function with environment mode parameter.

methods.name: loadEnv
methods.description: Loads environment variables based on the current mode and working directory.
